WorkItem.Description: The tooltip popup in beta 9 seems to come up and go down way too fast.  Not sure of the component you are using, but you might want to see if there is a timer on it for determining the popup and down values.

Comments.Message: Someone else mentioned this as well. I'll see if I can get it fixed for Beta 9a.

I'm using 9a.

I consider myself a fast reader, but I can't get through the whole "mitigation points" tooltip or the "Survival points" tooltip before it goes down. I'm sure this is a 1 (or 3 as the case may be) time thing, as once you've read what these two ratings are for, you shouldn't really need to read 'em again. Just a 'nice-to-have' for future releases & new users.
